relationships.description: Ribis is forwarding political news to Epstein, suggesting an ongoing communication relationship

analysis.purpose: To share a political news article about Trump fundraising efforts
analysis.significance: Shows Epstein's network included individuals who shared political news and fundraising information during the 2016 election cycle

details: Washington Post article about California allies rolling out new pro-Trump super PAC with $20 million fundraising target

analysis.summary: Nicholas Ribis forwards a Washington Post article to Jeffrey Epstein about a new pro-Trump super PAC in California aiming to raise $20 million by July 2016, indicating Epstein's interest in political fundraising developments during the election cycle.
